keyword: how many calories is in a taco bell chicken quesadilla
title: How Many Calories in a Taco Bell Chicken Quesadilla?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in a taco bell chicken quesadilla—about 510 kcal—plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Taco Bell Chicken Quesadilla?
assumptions: Standard Taco Bell menu item: flour tortilla filled with grilled chicken, three-cheese blend, creamy jalapeño sauce; no customizations or sides.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, customizations, and portion size. Check Taco Bell app or website for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A Taco Bell chicken quesadilla has about 510 calories and 27 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with menu info.

tweaks.label: Substitute with soft taco instead of quesadilla tortilla

faqs.q: How many calories is in a Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: Approximately 510 calories for the standard version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: About 27 g of protein from the grilled chicken and cheese.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: Yes, around 43 g total carbs, including 3 g fiber from the tortilla.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: Roughly 1230 mg, mostly from the cheese and sauce.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: Opt for no cheese or extra sauce to reduce by 100–150 kcal.
